about.title: About Us
about.description: Our commitment to innovation and quality ensures that you receive the best products and services available. Join us in experiencing the future of technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Transforming Smiles, Transforming Lives
mission.paragraph1: At Sorriso, our mission is to revolutionize dental tourism by providing exceptional dental care combined with unforgettable travel experiences. We aim to offer personalized, high-quality, and affordable dental treatments in beautiful destinations, ensuring every patient returns home with a brighter, healthier smile and cherished memories.
mission.paragraph2: We are committed to excellence in dental care, utilizing the latest technology and techniques to achieve optimal patient outcomes. Our dedicated team of professionals works tirelessly to make dental tourism accessible and enjoyable for everyone, bridging the gap between world-class dental services and the adventure of exploring new places.

section1.title: Patients Come First
section1.subtitle: Sorriso Has Your Back
section1.description: Sorriso is an agency that takes you on a transformative journey towards better dental health and a beautiful smile.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Smile?
cta.description: Contact us today to schedule your consultation and take the first step towards a healthier, brighter smile.

youtubeEmbed.title: High Quality Dentistry
youtubeEmbed.description: Watch our video to understand the seamless process of dental tourism with Sorriso. From the initial online consultation to scheduling, arrival in Montenegro, and undergoing your procedure, we ensure a smooth and comfortable experience. Discover the beauty of Montenegro while receiving the best dental care.

topSection.title: Meet Our Team of Expert Dentists
topSection.description: Discover the exceptional skills and qualifications of our friendly dentists, dedicated to providing you with the best dental care. Their expertise spans across various dental specializations, ensuring you receive comprehensive treatment.

member1.name: Ivan Čabrilo
member1.description: Mr. Čabrilo is from Montenegro and currently studies at the University of Rochester in New York with a full scholarship. He double majors in Computer Science and Business while actively researching AI and Machine Learning.

member2.name: Dr. Filip Šuković med. dent.
member2.description: Dr. Filip Šuković was born in Cetinje. He completed high school at St. Clare's International College in Oxford and began his dental studies at Birkbeck University in London, finishing them at the Faculty of Dentistry CEU Cardinal Herrera in Valencia.

member3.name: Djordje Ivanović
member3.description: Mr. Ivanović is from Podgorica, Montenegro, and currently studies at Harvard University in Boston, Massachusetts, on a prestigious scholarship. He is pursuing a career in Computer Science with an interest in Economics.

team.title: Meet Our Expert Team
team.description: We have partnered with the best dentists in the country with a long-standing tradition of excellence spanning over 30 years. Their exceptional service, attention to detail, and understanding guarantee you the smile you've always wanted.

scheduleAppointment.title: Schedule an Appointment
scheduleAppointment.description: Ready to transform your smile? Book an appointment with our expert team today and start your journey towards a brighter, healthier future.

dentalTravelIntro.title: Dental Travel with Sorriso
dentalTravelIntro.description: Visit the country endowed with untouched natural beauty. Take your entire family for a vacation, get the smile you always wanted, and pay less.

card1.caption: Stay
text: is a small Adriatic island near Budva in Montenegro. It used to be a fishing village with houses dating back to the 15th century.
The island is not open to the general public, but only to residents, hotel guests or as part of a guided tour.

There are several old churches on the island, including that of (Sveti Stefan) which gave the island its name. In the 1950s and 1960s, the entire small village was converted into a hotel island while maintaining its original looks.

card2.caption: See
text: is an artificial islet off the coast of Perast, Montenegro, created by bulwarks of rocks and sunken ships over 200 years. It houses the Catholic Church and a museum.
According to legend, the islet was built by seamen who found an icon of Madonna and Child on a rock on 22nd July 1452 and made an oath to lay a rock there after each successful voyage.
This tradition continues today with an annual event called fašinada on July 22, when locals take boats and throw rocks into the sea, widening the islet's surface.

card3.caption: Explore
text: is one of 5 national parks of the country. It is a massif located in northwestern Montenegro. It is part of the Dinaric Alps.

Its highest peak, Bobotov Kuk, reaches a height of 2,523 meters (8,278 ft). The massif is limited by the Tara River Canyon on the north, the Piva River Canyon on the west, and by the Komarnica River Canyon on the south.
The massif gives its name to the national park that comprises it. Durmitor National Park was founded in 1952, and designated as a World Heritage Site in 1980.

card4.caption: Dine
text: Montenegro has a rich Mediterranean diet that is considered amongst the healthiest and tastiest in the world. The variety of spices and food will definitely blow your taste buds.

Having a rich wine history as an integral part of the culture, you can get a world-class wine in markets under €10. Furthermore, for just €50 a 4-person family can have an amazing lunch right next to the sea, with a variety of fresh fish plates and wine choices.

montenegroHighlights.title: Why Montenegro?
montenegroHighlights.description: Montenegro is a hidden gem that attracts visitors with its stunning landscapes, rich history, and warm hospitality. With its Mediterranean climate, golden beaches, mountainous landscapes, interesting history, affordable prices, and delicious local cuisine, Montenegro has everything a tourist could possibly want from a European adventure.
montenegroHighlights.ctaButton: Need Travel Advice? Chat with us

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.subtitle: Enhancing Montenegro as a Dental Tourism Hub
vision.paragraph1: At Sorriso, our vision is to position Montenegro as the premier destination for dental tourism. We aim to blend top-tier dental care with the breathtaking beauty and rich culture of Montenegro, providing a unique and transformative experience for our patients.
vision.paragraph2: We are committed to leveraging the latest dental technologies and partnering with the best professionals to ensure exceptional care. By promoting Montenegro's stunning landscapes and luxurious accommodations, we strive to create unforgettable journeys that go beyond dental treatment.
